featureSchema.name: Task Management
featureSchema.description: Provides functionality for users to edit, delete, and mark tasks as complete. This helps in maintaining an up-to-date task list.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to edit, delete, or complete tasks so that I can manage my to-do list effectively.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: Users must be able to update task details, remove tasks, and mark tasks as completed. The UI should update to reflect the task's current state.
featureSchema.additional: Include confirmation dialogs for deletions and visual feedback when a task is marked as complete.
featureSchema.prompt: Implement features that allow editing, deleting, and completing tasks. The system should handle state changes appropriately and update the interface in real-time.
featureSchema.notes: Ensure changes are synchronized with the backend and handle possible conflicts if multiple users are working on the same tasks.
